content:
ok, can you please check the build.fhir.org site and see what I've done for normative:

  • every single html page has a status br now
  • normative pages have a comment on them
  • ballot-intro.html is back, and explains the ballot plans
  • the resource list and toc indicate what's candidate normative

Still to do:

  • Some operations are normative, and some are not
It would be good if there was a page that included a link to every normative page & artifact (including each operation, value set, etc.)
ok, I've done all the changes now - would be good to review on today's call
